lead_paragraph: The company will combine its vaunted research group with the unit focused on products that use artificial intelligence, like Bing and Cortana.

headline.print_headline: Microsoft  Reorganizes  Its Research  Into A.I.
headline.main: Microsoft Reorganizes Its Research Efforts Around A.I.

snippet: The company will combine its vaunted research group with the unit focused on products that use artificial intelligence, like Bing and Cortana....
abstract: Microsoft announces creation of new organization that combines its research group and number of products that rely on artificial intelligence; reorganization was made so company can accelerate development and delivery of AI research technology.
